TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p iː z k oʊ l s t ɛ l ɐ æ s k h ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ d iː z s θ ɪ ŋ z f w ɪ h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔː s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v θ ɪ k s l æ b z ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n aɪ k f ɔː h ɜː b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɔ b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ə s m oʊ p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d b ɪ ɡ t aɪ f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɑː ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b ʌ ɡ z æ n d w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m ɪ t h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
